p: The cell line 293T was used and cells were placed in a 24-well plate and then transfected with plasmids to express the influenza A virus A/WSN/33 (H1N1) PB1, PB2, PA, NP and vNS-Luc (150 ng of each) with pCMV β-gal (50 ng) for 6 h followed by the addition of NC-5 (10 μM, 40 μM and 80 μM), DMSO and ribavirin (RBV) (40 μM). The cell lysates were collected after 24 h and subjected to the luciferase assay [ 22].
